long_description: Get out of town quick with all your gear in 1 bag. The REI Tech Beast 65L duffel is targeted for those grab-and-go, active weekend adventures. Skip the bells and whistles of wheeled luggage and go! Carry the Tech Beast 65L duffle over your shoulder or backpack style; backpack shoulder straps easily store away with single zipper closure when not in use. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides comfort and secure single-shoulder carry. Ergonomic shape has padded backside and conforms to the body while carrying for a more comfortable journey. Top and side grab handles for ease of hauling. Top features an easy-access zipper pocket for stowing small items such as boarding pass, pen and keys; includes an additional small exterior zip pocket. All exterior pocket zippers can be secured with standard travel locks, sold separately. Interior zippered pocket and mesh zip pocket under the lid panel add organization. REI Tech Beast 65L duffel is made from rugged, water-repellent materials; light-colored lining lets you find items easily.
short_description: Get out of town quick with all your gear in 1 bag. The REI Tech Beast 65L duffel is targeted for those grab-and-go, active weekend adventures. Skip the bells and whistles of wheeled luggage and go!
